lines.text: You won't convince me, you or the rest of the world. I'm true to my generation. This is my house, and I won't change it. My car is really old, but I find it comfortable, and I wont' change it. I won't change anything!
This butter is rancid! Change it!
You didn't tell me you could drive.
Well, it's the first time I drive!

[Gasping]
No way! You didn't tell me that either!
